movies.title: Youth of the Beast
movies.plot: Joe Shishido plays a tough guy with a secret agenda. His violent behavior comes to the attention of a yakuza boss who immediately recruits him. He soon tries to make a deal with a rival gang a starts a gang war. His real motivations are gradually revealed as we find out how this all ties in with the murder of a policeman shown at the beginning of the film.
movies.simplePlot: A violent thug plays opposing yakuza bosses against each other.

biography.bio: Jô Shishido was born on December 6, 1933 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Branded to Kill (1967), La barrière de chair (1964) and Youth of the Beast (1963).
biography.name: Jô Shishido

biography.bio: Misako Watanabe was born on October 22, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kwaidan (1964), Youth of the Beast (1963) and The Great Passage (2013). She was previously married to Katsumi Ohyama.
biography.name: Misako Watanabe

biography.bio: Tamio Kawaji was born on July 21, 1938 in Zushi, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Tokyo Drifter (1966), Daikyojû Gappa (1967) and Story of a Prostitute (1965).
biography.name: Tamio Kawaji

biography.bio: Minako Katsuki is an actress, known for Youth of the Beast (1963), Kenjû zankoku monogatari (1964) and Keiji monogatari: Tôkyô no meiro (1960).
biography.name: Minako Katsuki

biography.bio: Daizaburô Hirata is an actor, known for Youth of the Beast (1963), Kantô mushuku (1963) and Story of a Prostitute (1965).
biography.name: Daizaburô Hirata

biography.bio: Eiji Gô was born on May 29, 1937 in Osaka, Japan. He was an actor, known for Tokyo Drifter (1966), Le cimetière de la morale (1975) and Zero Woman: Red Handcuffs (1974). He was married to Naomi Chiaki. He died on September 11, 1992 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Eiji Gô

biography.bio: Kôichi Uenoyama is an actor, known for Youth of the Beast (1963), Inazuman Furashu (1974) and Kindan no jôji (1977).
biography.name: Kôichi Uenoyama

biography.bio: Akiji Kobayashi was born on September 6, 1930 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Harakiri (1962), Ultraman: A Special Effects Fantasy Series (1966) and Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart at the River Styx (1972). He died on August 27, 1996.
biography.name: Akiji Kobayashi

biography.bio: Yûzô Kiura is an actor, known for Tokyo Drifter (1966), Youth of the Beast (1963) and Story of a Prostitute (1965).
biography.name: Yûzô Kiura

biography.bio: Naomi Hoshi is an actress, known for Detective Bureau 2-3: Go to Hell Bastards (1963), Youth of the Beast (1963) and Tôge o wataru wakai kaze (1961).
biography.name: Naomi Hoshi

biography.bio: Hiroshi Kôno is an actor, known for Youth of the Beast (1963), Tattooed Life (1965) and Kantô mushuku (1963).
biography.name: Hiroshi Kôno

biography.bio: Eimei Esumi was born on October 5, 1935 in Shimane, Japan as Esumi Hideaki. He was an actor, known for L'île au trésor (1978), Kuroneko (1968) and Tokyo Drifter (1966). He died on August 22, 2004 in Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Eimei Esumi

biography.bio: Shuntarô Tamamura is an actor, known for Ugetsu (1953), Tokyo Drifter (1966) and Youth of the Beast (1963).
biography.name: Shuntarô Tamamura

biography.bio: Mizuho Suzuki was born on October 23, 1927 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on Akira (1988), Godzilla 1985 (1984) and Chi no mure (1970).
biography.name: Mizuho Suzuki

biography.bio: Zenji Yamada is an actor, known for Koruto wa ore no pasupooto (1967), Daikyojû Gappa (1967) and Youth of the Beast (1963).
biography.name: Zenji Yamada
